pychell API reference¶

Likelihoods¶

class pychell.orbits.rvlikes.MixedRVLikelihood(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: optimize.scores.MixedLikelihood

compute_logL(pars, apply_priors=True)¶

Computes the log of the likelihood.

Parameters

  • pars (Parameters) – The parameters to use.

  • apply_priors (bool, optional) – Whether or not to apply the priors. Defaults to True.

Returns

The log likelihood, ln(L).

Return type

float

compute_redchi2(pars)¶

Computes the reduced chi2 statistic (weighted MSE).

Parameters

pars (Parameters) – The parameters.

Returns

The reduced chi-squared statistic.

Return type

float

Parameters
